name: OR_LNLG_SCD
description: This table contains the SCD information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line (ORM) record

columns.name: SCD_DEVICE_ID
columns.description: The sequential compression device (SCD) device ID.

columns.name: SCD_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: The area category ID for the sequential compression device (SCD) associated with the procedural log.

columns.name: SCD_DEVICE_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of sequential compression device (SCD).

columns.name: SCD_PRESSURE
columns.description: The pressure setting of the sequential compression device (SCD).

columns.name: SCD_LEFT_PULSE
columns.description: The left pulse of the sequential compression device (SCD).

columns.name: SCD_RIGHT_PULSE
columns.description: The right pulse of the sequential compression device (SCD).
